item.title: Rest VS GraphQL
item.description: GraphQL vs REST GraphQL is an open source query language for APIs. It’s architecture is subversive compared to the more commonplace REST architecture. Originally developed by Facebook in 2012, then released as an open source project in 2015. “By 2027, more than 60% of enterprises will use GraphQL in production, up from less than 30% in 2024”, according to the following Gartner Report Disclaimer The following article is not all encompassing.
